share on x sm sheri myersjun 21 at 9:20 pm lit a candle in memory of richard j. shore. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x so stacy olson. jun 21 at 5:58 pm i have too many great memories with richard to name just one... starts from way back when i was a lil girl til present... he was a great man n always could put a smile on my face.. i would get a phone call saying hey kiddo how u doin always put a smile on my face i love you rich n u will b missed but never forgottencomment share comment share facebook twitter share on x dt darlene tudor. jun 21 at 4:12 pm words can not express my deepest sorrow for the loss of cousin "richie". i will always remember all the fun times we had together growing up as kids, going to school in tripoli, and just enjoyed all the family times we shared together throughout the years. you will be sadly missed and always loved in our hearts forever. may god bless you and keep you until we meet again someday in heaven. your loving cousin, darlene ("chick") tudor and husband derrick. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 25. 9:00 am - 12:00 pm krueger family funeral home101 north second street. tomahawk, wi, us, 54487. get order flowers now for richard's visitation funeral service. jun 25. 12:00 pm krueger family funeral home101 north second street. tomahawk, wi, us, 54487. get order flowers now for richard's funeral service no medias to show. 365 days of grief support. subscribe facebook krueger family funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
